Not sure :( Right now, the place that's hosting the site for us is
overbilling us (they're charging us for an old account, plus a new account,
plus some services that we're not using).  Because of that, if we can't
change it, we may have to remove it ... otherwise, I may cheat and
temporarily host it somewhere like Sluggy ( http://sluggy.com
<http://sluggy.com> ) so that I can make changes to it again.  Eventually,
if someone with time wants to work on the site, we'll probably do that :)
 
--Tom
